products.title: LITTLE BOWL IN SLATE GRAY
products.description: This little stoneware bowl is as timeless as it is tactile: a wide angle from base to rim means there’s no need to compromise between function and form, and the half-lip edge offers a talking-point design feature without needing to say a word. Ideal for individual snacks, the Little Bowl’s rims can also be combined to create a playfully tessellating centrepiece.
products.specs: L4.4" x W4.9" x H1.7" Ceramic

products.title: SUGAR & SPICE BOWL IN CHALK
products.description: This sugar & spice bowl celebrates the satisfaction of a perfect fit. Three parts form one cohesive whole, igniting a robust dialogue between refined glazing and exposed stoneware that continues our legacy of elevated essentials. Fill with your favorite sweetener or loose leaf tea or store salts and spices to enlist in your next savory dish.
products.specs: L3" x W3.7" x H3.2" Ceramic

products.title: CERAMIC TEAPOT IN TABACCO
products.description: This teapot is an ode to the pragmatic and the purposeful, offering a timeless silhouette in departo's signature tones. The stoneware pot and lid retain heat while the tapered lip propels an easy pour.
products.specs: L7" x W4.7" x H4.2" / 21 oz ceramic

products.title: LOW GLASS IN CLEAR
products.description: Departo’s Low Glass proves that considered design should extend to even the simplest pieces. Made for convenience and flexibility of use, this is glassware that is as covetable as it is accessible. Ideal for wine, water or short cocktails, what better way to furnishing the everyday?

products.title: KINTO SEPIA MUG
products.description: Like looking into an old photo, SEPIA brings nostalgia and comfort. This cup in your hand suggests old memories. Feel at ease.

products.title: SLEEPING CAT CHOPSTICK REST
products.description: These stoneware chopstick rests are fun for all food lovers. Let your tired chopsticks take a break on a bed of tofu crowned with soy, wonderfully curved wasabi, or colorful dango, just to name a few. These best-selling gems made in the Mino Province of Japan are sure to bring a bit of joy to your dinner table. Buy in pairs or mix and match for the ultimate quirky tablescape.
note: Not intended for children's play. Keep away from young children

products.title: WOODEN SPOON
products.description: This special wood is sourced from fruit trees called Sao's tree in Indonesia. It features unique grain and texture and rich color. Because the wood is harder than most, each spoon is handmade by craftsmen.
products.specs: L7.5" x W1.8" x H0.6" / Natural wood

products.title: CERAMIC FUJI RICE BOWL
products.description: This unique, handmade ceramic Japanese Rice Bowl is perfect for everyday use. Its design is inspired by Japan's beloved Mt. Fuji and every piece is slightly different. Reliable and durable, this bowl is an essential item for any kitchen.

products.title: FLUFFY PILLOW INCENSE BOX
products.description: Sweet Sandalwood scent for a cozy relaxed mood. 70 sticks of incense that burn for 15-20 minutes each. Sturdy metal case the can be carried anywhere. Incense clip included. Natural Ingredients. Top can be used as burning tray. Quick start guide included.
note: Do not leave burning incenses unattended
Keep out of reach of pets and children

articles.title: RECIPE: CLAYPOT SESAME OIL CHICKEN RICE
articles.preview: Inspired by a Taiwanese dish Sesame Oil Chicken Soup (麻油雞), this dish is essentially a non-soup version of the Taiwanese dish.

articles.title: GUIDE: CERAMIC POTTERY VS. PORCELAIN
articles.preview: More often than not, “ceramics” is used as a blanket term to describe both pottery (earthenware) and porcelain.
